name: Kalimotxo
description: A cheap and refreshing drink that is easy to make with common ingredients
ingredients: 1/2 cup cheap red wine of your choice
Lime or Lemon wedge, depending on preference or available ingredients
directions: Pour 1/2 glass of cola (roughly maintaining 1:1 ratio with the wine from previous step)
Optional: squeeze lime/lemon wedge juice into the drink
